alert.note: Alert for Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 18 at 2:13AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Henry, Houston, northwestern Jackson, western Miller, northwestern Seminole and Early Counties through 245 AM EDT/145 AM CDT/... At 212 AM EDT/112 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles east of Headland to near Cowarts to near Graceville. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Graceville, Blakely, Donalsonville, Dothan, Headland, Ashford, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Kinsey, Centerville, Malone, Rehobeth, Avon, Madrid, Gordon, Campbellton, Jakin and Haleburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
